useCase.name: Remove Audio Effect
useCase.trigger: User selects to remove an audio effect

mainSequence.step: User selects the audio effect removal option
Dropdown menu is activated displaying effect removal options
Dropdown menu directs to close the effect removal panel
Audio effect action triggers the removal of the selected effect
Audio effect saga initiates the removal saga process
Audio controller removes the effect from the audio
Dropdown menu removes the selected audio effect removal option
